scripts.create:stage: claudia create --name stage-redeem-code --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::490542543401:role/DynamoDBFullAccess --config claudia-stage.json
scripts.create:prod: claudia create --name prod-redeem-code --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::490542543401:role/DynamoDBFullAccess --config claudia-prod.json
